name: hp-up
effect: Used on a party Pokémon : Increases HP effort by 10, but won’t increase it beyond 100. Increases happiness by 5/3/2.

flavor_text.black_white: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.
flavor_text.black_2_white_2: A nutritious drink for Pokémon. It raises the base HP of a single Pokémon.
